body_html: Ok, but be careful with the reshape, I saw a strange behavior that I don't understand when trying to reduce dimensionality in caffe2 (from 5d to 4d). The print of the tensor shows the right size, but the gradient gets wrong in its dimensions.
body_text: Ok, but be careful with the reshape, I saw a strange behavior that I don't understand when trying to reduce dimensionality in caffe2 (from 5d to 4d). The print of the tensor shows the right size, but the gradient gets wrong in its dimensions.
body: Ok, but be careful with the reshape, I saw a strange behavior that I don't understand when trying to reduce dimensionality in caffe2 (from 5d to 4d). The print of the tensor shows the right size, but the gradient gets wrong in its dimensions.
